AT.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
AT.description: Richte in diesem intensiven Shoot'em up-Klassiker hinter den feindlichen Linien Schaden an. In 3D überarbeitete Version! In 3D Classics Xevious sitzt du im Cockpit eines topmodernen Solvalou-Kampfjägers und musst in einer wagemutigen Mission in den feindlichen Luftraum eindringen. Du bist die letzte Hoffnung der Menschheit auf die Beseitigung des bösen XEVIOUS-Kollektivs. Hole Welle für Welle feindlicher Kampfjäger vom Himmel, lasse deine schlagkräftigen gelenkten Bomben fallen und schalte die kolossale fliegende Festung aus, um die XEVIOUS-Kriegsmaschinerie in die Knie zu zwingen. Xevious wird als einer der Urahnen der vertikal scrollenden Shoot'em ups angesehen und kann in 3D auch heute noch beeindrucken!

AU.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
AU.description: Strike deep behind enemy lines in the intense classic shooter, now revamped in 3D! 3D Classics Xevious puts you in the cockpit of a state-of-the-art Solvalou strike fighter on a daring mission to infiltrate hostile airspace. You are humanity's last hope of eradicating the sinister XEVIOUS collective - shoot down wave after wave of enemy fighters, drop your deadly payload of guided bombs and take out the colossal flying fortress to bring the XEVIOUS war machine to its knees! Considered one of the forefathers of the overhead vertical shooter, Xevious can yet still dazzle with new 3D features!

BG.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
BG.description: Strike deep behind enemy lines in the intense classic shooter, now revamped in 3D! 3D Classics Xevious puts you in the cockpit of a state-of-the-art Solvalou strike fighter on a daring mission to infiltrate hostile airspace. You are humanity's last hope of eradicating the sinister XEVIOUS collective - shoot down wave after wave of enemy fighters, drop your deadly payload of guided bombs and take out the colossal flying fortress to bring the XEVIOUS war machine to its knees! Considered one of the forefathers of the overhead vertical shooter, Xevious can yet still dazzle with new 3D features!

BE.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
BE.description: Frappez loin derrière les lignes ennemies dans cet intense classique du tir vertical, maintenant disponible en 3D ! Dans 3D Classics Xevious, vous vous retrouvez aux commandes du Solvalou, un vaisseau de combat dernier cri. Votre audacieuse mission est d'infiltrer l'espace aérien ennemi, et vous êtes le dernier espoir de l'humanité face à la menace de la sinistre armée XEVIOUS. Abattez les chasseurs ennemis vague après vague, larguez votre cargaison de missiles dévastateurs et anéantissez l'imposante forteresse volante afin de mettre à genoux la machine de guerre XEVIOUS. Considéré comme l'un des précurseurs des jeux de tir à défilement vertical, Xevious, avec ses nouveaux effets 3D, est toujours capable de briller !

ES.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
ES.description: ¡Acaba con el ejército enemigo en este intenso juego de disparos - ahora en 3D! En "3D Classics Xevious" te pondrás a los mandos del Solvalou, una moderna nave de combate, con la arriesgada misión de atravesar el espacio aéreo enemigo. La amenaza del siniestro ejército de Xevious se cierne sobre la humanidad y tú eres la última esperanza. Deberás derribar oleadas de naves enemigas, lanzar mortales ataques con proyectiles y destruir la imponente nave nodriza. Este juego, considerado uno de los predecesores de los juegos de disparar de desplazamiento vertical y vista cenital, te sorprenderá con sus nuevas características 3D.

IT.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
IT.description: Fatti strada e abbatti le linee nemiche in questo coinvolgente classico sparatutto, da oggi disponibile anche in 3D! Parti per un viaggio a bordo della Solvalou, una modernissima e agguerrita astronave da combattimento. Affronta un'audace missione, con l'intento di riuscire a penetrare lo spazio aereo nemico. L'intera umanità conta solo su di te per annientare il sinistro esercito di Xevious! Elimina tutte le orde nemiche, una dopo l'altra, e lancia il tuo carico di bombe distruggendo la mastodontica fortezza volante e mettendo infine in ginocchio la macchina da guerra di Xevious! Noto come uno degli antenati degli sparatutto a scorrimento verticale, Xevious riuscirà a stupirti con le sue nuovissime caratteristiche in una moderna versione 3D!

NL.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
NL.description: Sla ver achter de vijandelijke linies toe in deze intense shooter-klassieker, nu vernieuwd in 3D. In 3D Classics Xevious tref je jezelf in de cockpit van een state-of-the-art Solvalou gevechtsvliegtuig aan, op een missie waarin je het vijandelijke luchtruim infiltreert. Jij bent de laatste hoop van de mensheid op het elimineren van het sinistere XEVIOUS-collectief. Haal golf na golf van vijandelijke eenheden neer, werp je dodelijke lading geleide bommen af en schakel het gigantische vliegende fort uit om de XEVIOUS-oorlogsmachine te vernietigen! Beschouwd als een van de grondleggers van het verticale shootergenre, weet Xevious ook nu nog steeds te verbluffen dankzij de nieuwe 3D-kenmerken!

NZ.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
NZ.description: Strike deep behind enemy lines in the intense classic shooter, now revamped in 3D! 3D Classics Xevious puts you in the cockpit of a state-of-the-art Solvalou strike fighter on a daring mission to infiltrate hostile airspace. You are humanity's last hope of eradicating the sinister XEVIOUS collective - shoot down wave after wave of enemy fighters, drop your deadly payload of guided bombs and take out the colossal flying fortress to bring the XEVIOUS war machine to its knees! PT.name: 3D Classics Xevious™
PT.description: Combate para além das linhas inimigas neste shooter clássico intenso agora disponível em 3D! Em 3D Classics Xevious estás ao comando de Solvalou, uma moderna nave de combate, com a arriscada missão de atravessar o espaço aéreo inimigo. És a última esperança para erradicar o sinistro exército XEVIOUS. Abate as naves inimigas, vaga após vaga, lança ataques mortais com mísseis guiados e destrói a imponente fortaleza voadora para colocares um fim à máquina de guerra XEVIOUS. Considerado como um dos pioneiros de disparo vertical central, Xevious ainda te surpreenderá com as suas características 3D!
